name: あさひ
text: 現場調べる人いっぱいっすね……
trans: Looks like lotsa people are gonna investigate the crime scene...

name: あさひ
text:
じゃあ、わたしはここに残って
みんなは昨日何してたか一覧表にまとめるっす！
trans:
Then, I'm gonna stay here and compile a list
of what everyone did yesterday!

name: 弟子
text:
とてもありがたいお申し出ですが……
そんなことができるんですか？
trans:
That's a huge help but...
Can you really do that?

name: あさひ
text: 昨日、カメラであちこち撮ってたっす
trans: Yesterday, I used my camera in tons of places.

name: あさひ
text:
死亡時刻がわかったら照らし合わせて
アリバイある人が浮かび上がるっすよ
trans:
If we find out the time of A's death, we just gotta 
match the time and find out who's got an alibi and 
who doesn't.

name: 雛菜
text:
雛菜も他の人たちも
動画撮りながら歩いてたから
trans:
A lot of us including Hinana walked around while 
rolling our cameras too.

name: あさひ
text: あっ、そのデータも欲しいっす！
trans: Ah, please give me that data!

name: 雛菜
text:
ん～？
はい、いいですよ～

name: 千雪
text: データを集めて犯人を捜すの、とってもいいと思う……！
trans:
Putting together data to find the perpetrator, 
how wonderful...!

name: 千雪
text:
ただ、死亡推定時刻の偽装トリックには
気をつけたい、かな……
trans:
But, the murderer might have used some tricks to 
delay falsify A's time of death. We have to be careful...

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈が前に関わった事件でも
そういうのあったよ
trans: Amana's had a case where something like that happened too.

name: 甘奈
text:
遺体を氷で冷やして
死亡推定時刻を実際より前に誤認させる、って
trans:
By cooling the body with ice,
it's made to seem like the victim was murder a lot earlier.

name: 冬優子
text:
すみませーん……！
誰か、行動表書くのを手伝ってもらえますかー？
trans:
Sorry...!
Could anyone help me with detailing the movements 
of everyone?

name: 甘奈
text:
あ、はーい！
甜花ちゃん、千雪さん、行こう？
trans:
Ah, coming!
C'mon Tenka-chan, Chiyuki-san, let's go!

name: 咲耶
text: それじゃあ、私たちも現場に向かおう
trans: Well then, we better get going as well.

name: 咲耶
text: お弟子さん、案内を頼むよ
trans: Mr. Disciple, if you would please lead the way.

name: 弟子
text: 承りました、こちらです──
